en_2_ch: please pull out and insert the battery again,or charge low voltage battery

请给电压低的电池充电
please ask technical assistance for help
please ask technical assistance for help if repeats after reset
重启复现请联系技术支持
please slowly get craft back if craft behave abnormally
请小心将飞行器飞回并重启
please switch to atti mode if craft behave abnormally

please switch to mannual mode if craft behave abnormally
请切换到手动模式,如果飞机表现异常
please check sensor and reset the craft
请检测传感器并重启飞行器
please keep craft static and wait
请静置飞行器等待初始化完成
please keep craft static and calibrate IMU
请静置飞行器然后校准IMU
please cool the craft and calibrate IMU
请冷却飞行器然后校准IMU
please check GPS or VPS installed correctly
请检测GPS或视觉模块已正确安装
please check compass direction installed correctly
请检测指南针模块方向是否正确
please check compass direction installed correctly or magnetic interference existed
请检测指南针模块方向是否正确或者有电磁干扰
please move away from interference or calibrate compass
请远离干扰或校准指南针
请重启并检查连接情况
please move away from ground interference or calibrate compass
请远离地面干扰或校准指南针
